name: The Light into Dark
description:
The Light into the Dark takes place in another world. A spirit is trying to return home, but must go through trills before they can make a choice that will decide there fate.    

To play the game collect the keys and lights, they are your only way out. Be carful though not everything is as safe as it seems.

This game was created  for an intro to game design class.

Created using Bitsy editor

The art is fully original
